revised_title: Crystal Structures of Molecular Complexes of 4:4'-Dinitrodiphenyl
tldr: The article describes the crystal structures of several molecular complexes of 4:4'-dinitrodiphenyl with various substituted diphenyl compounds. The structures were analyzed using X-ray diffraction and compared to determine their similarities and differences. The study provides insights into the arrangement and packing of molecules in these complexes, contributing to the understanding of their properties and potential applications.
